thread.title: Disney Doodle: Snow White at the Germany Pavilion
thread.title_full: Disney Doodle: Snow White at the Germany Pavilion

author: Jennifer Fickley-Baker
title: Disney Doodle: Snow White at the Germany Pavilion
text:
Today’s Disney Doodle asks the question what would Snow White do if she had the chance to enjoy a Disney theme park all on her own?
In the beginning of the 1937 film “ Snow White ,” our original Disney Princess makes a wish at a wishing well, hoping her true love would find her. This moment in her story inspired artist Ashley Taylor to imagine Snow White heading to the Germany pavilion at Epcot to make just a few more wishes.
“I love Snow White’s wishing well in the Germany Pavilion,” Ashley said. “It was easy to picture Snow White wishing for her prince to come.”
